CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate
3. polym e r : P C 7^1 B M: Poly[[4,8-bis[(2-ethylhexyl)oxy]benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-2,6-diyl][3-fluoro-2-[(2-ethylhexyl)carbonyl]thieno[3,4-b]thiophenediyl]](C8-BTTT-CF)
4. p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ]: Poly[(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene)] (PFN)
5. Al: Aluminum

These are the "Material Name" entities found in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate
3. polym e r : P C 7^1 B M: Poly[[4,8-bis[(2-ethylhexyl)oxy]benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-2,6-diyl][3-fluoro-2-[(2-ethylhexyl)carbonyl]thieno[3,4-b]thiophenediyl]](C8-BTTT-CF)
6. p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ]: Poly[(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene)] (PFN)
7. Al: Aluminum

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

1. "photovoltaic properties" is a Property Name
2. "a thin layer of PFN" is a Property Name
3. "the cathode interlayer" is a Property Name
4. "it can improve the electron extraction" is a Property Description

The other terms in the paragraph are either materials, structures, or processes, not property names.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "photovoltaic properties" is a Material Property
2. "a thin layer" is not a Material Property
3. "PFN" is not a Material Property, it is a material
4. "the cathode interlayer" is a Material Property
5. "it can improve the electron extraction" is not a Material Property, it is a process or effect.

So, the only clear Material Property entities in the paragraph are:

* photovoltaic properties
* the cathode interlayer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic properties |
| the cathode interlayer |

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate

4. p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ): A type of polymer (the exact name is provided in the text)

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (transparency, conductivity)
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate (conductivity)
3. polym e r : P C 7^1 B M: A type of polymer (optical properties, bandgap)
4. PFN: A type of polymer (electron extraction, work function)
5. Al: Aluminum (work function, reflectivity)
